instructions: On your watch, open the Google Pay app . Tap Get started . Set up screen lock (if you haven't already). On your phone, follow the instructions to add a credit or debit card. Note: This only adds a card to the Google Pay app on your watch (not your phone). Your card will show up on your watch.
Restart your phone (not your watch). Wait 30 - 60 seconds. This makes sure your phone has installed updates needed to use your watch. On your watch, open Google Pay and tap Retry .
